name: Back to the future (itch)
description:
York University

Datt4300 Game3 Group5

Instruction:

"Back to the future" is a 3D modeling game with 2D version made by Unity. Mainly use Y2K art. Download the rar file and extract. Double click the exe file inside the folder to play.

Game Play:

Danger! Some evil robots from the Year 2050 are travelling through time to the Year 2000. They want to occupy the Earth in Year two thousand since humans don't have enough technology at that time. You are a time guardian soldier also from the Year 2050. Your mission is to destroy those evil travellers to save history and finally get back to the future.

Defeat the enemies, collect some special powers like double jump in the map and finally get to the destination! Enjoy the game!

Control:

Keyboard "w,a,s,d" to move

Keyboard "space" to jump 

left mouse button ---- shoot
